entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and 70 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
